review: I canceled my cable way before it was popular to do so.  I subscribed to Netflix and Amazon Prime and used several different devices to stream over the years.  Hands down, Amazon Fire TV is the way to go.  Not only does it have voice recognition and the best menus I have seen, but if you have a person who likes to play games, you get Play Station and X-Box type games for free or very inexpensive.  My daughter is still talking about how much she loves the games and everything else about this product.  Amazon knocked it out of the park with this one.  I also love my Kindle Fire and looking very forward to getting The Amazon Echo.  Move over Apple, Amazon is taking over.
author: Stephen M. Geraci "Steve-o"
